reviews.review_msg: He is an OK teacher. He explain stuff in a rather dificult way, but if you study before hand and go to his lectures, you understand everything. Be aware! You need to do a lot of research because his notes are not very complete and textbook is sometimes useless. Tutorials definitely help.

first half semester was esay, second half was extremely difficult! RMB dont copy codes from others, he will compare codes one by one, if you get caught, you failed. Also you need to know how the program works, otherwise u fail too!

He is a Terrible teacher. I guess it's because he is too smart and thinks every body is a genius like himself. I almost didn't go to half of his lectures and studied on my own. Assignments and exams aren't very difficult. The final project is a bit time consuming, but it, also, isn't that hard.
WANA get a C- or D ? take this course with this guy then

He was not bad when he was a TA but he has absolutely no control over his class, no teaching skills, bad attitude and extremely rude, Avoid taking if possible. I wish they had given this course to Lila(his wife).

the worst prof ever. keep away from his class unless you want to study yourself and pay him for nothing. he will make you more confused than you really are. you want to kill yourself every time you step in to his class. huge waste of money and time. Oh and his accent!! kill me
